channel.title: Commands stopped working
channel.description:
some of my staff commands stopped working while i've been working on my source. I've added new commands recently and edited rights of certain commands but not the ones that have stopped working. I havn't gotten any compile errors.
three i know definately arnt working now but use to work yesterday are ::mypos,::teleto xxxx xxxx and ::item (although ::pickup still works)
heres copy of command file http://pastebin.com/qHCVdeGM (too big to post)

item.title: Commands stopped working
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Like this:

if (c.playerRights >= 0) {
    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command") {
        //Do whatever..
    }
}
else if (c.playerRights >= 1) {
    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command") {
        //Do whatever..
    }
}
else if (c.playerRights >= 2) {
    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command") {
        //Do whatever..
    }
}
else if (c.playerRights >= 3) {
    if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("command") {
        //Do whatever..
    }
}

Read full topic

item.title: Commands stopped working

item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

[code=java]#
if(c.playerRights >= 1)

                    if (playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) {[/code]

Did you forget some brackets?

item.title: Commands stopped working
item.dc:creator: @avirunes avirunes
item.description:
@avirunes wrote:

relmitos:

Try nesting those IF statements by playerRight

ok thanks, so by nesting you mean encapsulating them with { } (brackets are my worst enemy) , where abouts would i want to paste them, like are you able to give me an example of one place to put them.

Much appreciated, thanks

Read full topic
